course.title: Web Development Tools
course.catalogDescription: This course uses Adobe Design Suite tools to lead the student through the process of web-application development. Students will gain knowledge and hands-on practice in building and maintaining web applications using Dreamweaver, Flash, and Photoshop. Students will use Java, PHP and MySql to interact with external databases.

objectives.objective: Web-based applications within the Windows operating system.
Using structures within the PHP programming language.
Understand how CSS and XHTML integrate with PHP and MySQL.
Produce work using a combination of page layout, illustration, and photo manipulation software.
Design and implement a database design within a web application.
Control user access to software offered over the internet

outline.topic: Separation of Form and Function, CSS
